summary: Don Cleo, a humble seller of Piñatas, who lives in a little town in El Salvador; arrives at home after a long day of work to find an extortion letter at his door steps. That letter tells ... See full summary »
cast: Salvador Solís|Karla Valencia|Demetrio Aguilar|Leandro Sanchez Arauz|Rodrigo Calderon|Gerardo Chinchilla|Emis Cruz|Herbert de Paz|Mercy Flores|Guillermo Menendez|Brenda Samour|Marcela Santamaria|Milton Torres|Hector Vides|Giancarlo Villeda
title: Malacrianza
